attributes.additional_details: Every Missing Adult/ Child is important There is no resources, funding barely exists, everything runs on a shoe string, any funding given should be given fairly to each family, some get the funding they need others do not, many thousands of pounds have been given to one family, yet others are told, funding has been exhausted we can now only do periodic checks, families are left to do their own searches, why is this? they pay their taxes, we are a country of equality,  Justice should be for all
attributes.background: Missing Persons, funding is needed to help all Families Keep their search/investigation going. we are equal, not all families are treated the same  The Police only Get a certain amount of funding when it has gone our missing loved ones are forgotten  families are left living in Limbo

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do - perhaps requesting more funding for the police to investigate missing persons, or more funding for the charity Missing People in order to enable that organisation to help more people.
